ygData.subject: Re: Xiane, Exploration or Bust

    The pod hit the earth with a small explosion, the pod hitting the earth=
 tearing a deep gouge in the dirt as the pod used the earths crust as a lan=
ding pad. As was custom to do in such situations a scanner erupted from the=
 pod and began searching for a compatible life form, as the scanner returne=
d to the ship Xiane's body was being altered for its new form...

  (OOC...=
)

      A bit long hope it's not considered "moding". :)

  X

  {Xiane}

=
      Xiane slowly emerged from his downed escape pod his optic sensors sca=
nning the featureless grassy plains, watching a herd of wild horses gallopi=
ng off into the distance.

      The bot looked around slowly wondering whe=
re he was and for that matter who he was, his memory circuits seemed to be =
damaged and his internal repair programs were offline.

      Reaching back=
 into the pod Xiane removed two items, strapping both to his silvery body b=
efore transforming and taking a moment to look over the large horse he had =
become.

      At a trot the bot moved towards a random direction away from=
 the pod, hoping that there might be someone about...
